definitions.definition: become or cause to become less hot.
examples: we dived into the river to cool off
synonyms: refrigerate "cool the sauce in the fridge"

definitions.definition: become or cause to become calm or less excited.
examples: after I'd cooled off, I realized I was being irrational
synonyms: simmer down; informaltake a chill pill "after a while

definitions.definition: recover from strenuous physical exertion by doing gentle stretches and exercises; warm down.
behave in a less excitable manner.
examples: “Cool it and tell me why you're so ecstatic.”
